title: Unlocking sustainable power: advances in aqueous processing and water-soluble binders for NMC cathodes in high-voltage Li-ion batteries
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2125-2149
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00098F, Tutorial Review

Ana Clara Rolandi, Iratxe de Meatza, Nerea Casado, Maria Forsyth, David Mecerreyes, Cristina Pozo-Gonzalo
This review addresses the aqueous processing of high-nickel NMC materials and its challenges, including pH elevation and lithium leaching. Tailored binder selection is crucial, offering a strategic pathway for sustainable battery manufacturing.
